column4: We just secured a major arms deal, we will be selling some of our for export weapons and vehicles, for exchange of money and other things, this should boost our economy and improve our relations with the country we traded with!
Our state has a deflation issue, which has a negative effect on the GDP. Our state needs a higher money supply to increase the investment and stablize the economy.

Our state has an high inflation rate, because of the high amount of our money supply and low wages. It has a negative effect of the purchasing power and the GDP. Our currency strength is low and people fall into poverty. Many people do invests into no consumer goods.
Sweden has a large gang issue, we need to fund our police to combat this!
column5: The gangs are getting out of control!
